Title: XNAPF, du XNA dans du WPF
Description: This project aims to create a control for integrating easily an XNA rendering  in a WPF picture.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project aims to create a control for integrating easily an XNA rendering in a WPF picture.



How to use :

Create a classe inherites of XnaImage. The value of the template must be your Game classe.

and now just use your new classe as an Image Wpf

To get more information go to => http://www.notour.fr/?p=15
